headline.main: Opinion of George Wood, Esq., on the Malne Law.

docs.lead_paragraph: The act of the Legislature of this State, recently passed, for the Prevention of Intemperance, Panpetism and Crime, has been so fully discussed in the opinions of different gentlemen upon this subject, and accompanied with the citation of so many authorities, that I do not think it advisable at this time to enter largely into the discussion of it.
